name: Romanticize & Decay
description:
Romanticize & Decay is the twelfth in the FACES collection. This illustration is inspired by Allen Ginsberg:
’’I don’t do anything with my life except romanticize and decay with indecision’’.
It is about feeling like you are wasting your time romanticizing the past and being anxious about the future, while your life is passing by.
Every illustration in this collection has its own identity. The colour combinations say something about the person portrayed: who they are and how they feel. And through the way they make eye contact or look away, these individuals tell their story.

Artwork made by Bo Stiemer.
